headline.main: EUROPE.; ARRIVAL OF THE ASIA'S MAILS. History of the Hungarian War. POSITION AND DUTY OF THE UNITED STATES. TWO MORE SPEECHES OF KOSSUTH. The State of Europe.

docs.lead_paragraph: The steamer Asia reached Boston on Tuesday afternoon, and her mails reached this City last evening. We have received our European files and correspondence to the 11th, from London and the 13th from Paris.
docs.snippet: The steamer Asia reached Boston on Tuesday afternoon, and her mails reached this City last evening. We have received our European files and correspondence to the 11th, from London and the 13th from Paris.

docs.lead_paragraph: The U.S. Circuit Court met this morning, pursuant to adjournment. The crowd in attendance about the building was greater even than yesterday. It will be remembered that five jurors had been empannelled up to the adjournment last evening. The completion of the panel was the first business in order.

headline.main: BROOKLYN.; COMMON COUNCIL. THE LONG ISLAND RAILWAY. THE TEMPERANCE ORGANIZATION. CONTINENTAL GUARDS. NEW COMPANY. A QUANDARY. DRUNK AND DISORDERLY. FAMILY QUARREL. LARCENY. BOY ASSAULTED. ASSAULT. KINGS COUNTY BOARD OF SUPERVISORS. KINGS COUNTY COURT OF OYER AND TERMINER CIRCUIT COURT CITY COURT POIICE COURT.

docs.lead_paragraph: COMMON COUNCIL.--A special meeting of this Board was held last evening, for the purpose of considering the advertising of the Corporation. It appears that under the new Charter, the advertising has amounted to much more than it was supposed it would when the existing contract was entered into, and the proprietors of the papers have consequently memorialized the Board.

headline.main: Trial of Otis Grunzig for the Murder of his Wire.

docs.lead_paragraph: OVER AND TERMINER.--Before Chief Justice EDMONDS and Ald. MILLER and CONKLIN.--The People vs. Otis Grunzig.--On Monday, the prisoner was arraigned for the murder of his wife, Victorine Grunzig, by administering to her a does of arsenic in a mixture of sugar and water, of which she died on the 10th of August last.
docs.snippet: OVER AND TERMINER.--Before Chief Justice EDMONDS and Ald. MILLER and CONKLIN.--The People vs. Otis Grunzig.--On Monday, the prisoner was arraigned for the murder of his wife, Victorine Grunzig, by administering to her a does of arsenic in a mixture...

headline.main: ACAPULCO.; Climate, Rents, Expenses, &c.--The Route to the City of Mexico--Robbery-The steamer Stockton--The new United States Consul.

docs.lead_paragraph: When I left New-York for a year's probation at Acapulco, I promised, I belive, to keep you informed of anything of interest that might transpire in my "precinct;" and, although nothing of that character has yet laid me under contribution, I presume you think it is about time for me to report progress.

byline.original: Correspondence of The New-York Daily Times

headline.main: FOUR DAYS LATER FROM EUROPE.; ARRIVAL OF THE ATLANTIC. MOVEMENTS OF KOSSUTH. KOSSUTH'S LETTERS. DEPARTURE IN THE WASHINGTON FRENCH POLITICS. GENERAL NEWS FROM THE CONTINENT.

docs.lead_paragraph: The United States Mail Steamer Atlantic, Captain WEST, arrived yesterday morning at an early hour, from Liverpool. She sailed at noon on Wednesday, the 12th inst.
docs.snippet: The United States Mail Steamer Atlantic, Captain WEST, arrived yesterday morning at an early hour, from Liverpool. She sailed at noon on Wednesday, the 12th inst.

docs.lead_paragraph: By the arrival of the ship Margaret Eliza, Capt. ADAMS, from Buenos Ayres, we have dates to September 26.
docs.snippet: By the arrival of the ship Margaret Eliza, Capt. ADAMS, from Buenos Ayres, we have dates to September 26.
